subject: ClassNotFound  with junit and ant
msgSnippet: Using Junit task in build script, If I specify the required(by TestCases) jar files using the  tag, ant does not find the class and I get a
messageBody:
Using Junit task in build script, If I specify the required(by
TestCases) jar files using the <classpath> tag, ant does not find the
class and I get a ClassNotFound Exception.
example
==================================================================
<target name="test_cle" depends="compile_cle,test_context"
description="Run all JUnit tests">
<junit printsummary="yes" fork="no" haltonfailure="no">
<classpath>
<pathelement location="${TEST_CONTEXT_BUILD}"/>
<pathelement location="${JUNITX_JAR}"/>
<pathelement location="${JUNIT_JAR}"/>
<pathelement location="${EJB_JAR}"/>
</classpath>
<formatter type="plain" />
<test name="test.persistence.TestDeploymentConnector"
fork="no" todir="${UNIT_TEST_REPORTS}"
failureProperty="UNIT_TEST_FAILURE"/>
</junit>
==================================================================
Nor does it find if specify using

<sysproperty key="CLASSPATH"
path="${JAVA_BUILD_DIR};${TEST_CONTEXT_BUILD}"/>
==================================================================
If have those jars placed int the ANT_HOME/lib.. ant finds the
classes.

Any Idea why the classpath doesnt work for Junit task??? or Iam i
doing something wrong?

Thanks in advance

-Shaji
